title: How do you use a virtual cell to do something actually useful?
author: Abhishaike Mahajan
note: Explores practical applications of virtual cell models in cancer drug development, demonstrating how computational models trained on human tumor data can identify immunotherapy responders, refine clinical trial eligibility, and discover therapeutic targets.

title: Some questions about biotech that I find interesting
author: Alex Telford
note: Collection of open questions about the biotech and pharma industries, spanning R&D productivity, corporate dynamics, drug discovery mechanics, and regulatory frameworks.

title: The Adolescence of Technology
author: Dario Amodei
note: Dario's `Black seas of infinity` presents a catalogue of compounding risks, and reinforces that restraint is structurally hard because of structural incentives.
